actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code, to exempt State-conducted lotteries from certain prohibitions of Federal law.

summary.text: Exempts State-conducted lotteries from the prohibitions of Federal law concerning the conducting of lotteries through the mails.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code, to exempt State-conducted lotteries from certain prohibitions of Federal law.
